title: Formula X Effects Nail Color ~ Moon Walk
features: Timeless staples just got a brilliant makeover. Infused with an amazing luminescent ingredient that enhances color and overall shine, it also features a fast-drying agent that gives you a smooth, flawless finish in no time.
Sephora’s patented no-compromise formulation offers everything you’ve ever wanted in a nail color: invincible wear, incredible saturated color, and ultimate shine.
The brush design was engineered to complement the highly pigmented formula, giving you the most even and precise lacquer application.
Formula X for Sephora is 3-Free (Formaldehyde, Toluene and DBP).
description: Moon Walk is a glitter white with micro opal glitter shift from the Celestials collection. Formula X Celestials is a sophisticated metallic polish that fuses rich, matte color with luxurious, textured glitter. This exclusive metallic micro-glitter lacquer goes on with full coverage and dries down to a unique shimmer-meets-matte textured finish in just one coat. The brush design was engineered to complement the highly pigmented, three-free formula, giving you the most even and precise lacquer application.
